errors.message: This function is named "fallback" but is not the fallback function of the contract. If you intend this to be a fallback function, use "fallback(...) { ... }" without the "function" keyword to define it.

errors.formattedMessage: contracts/coinflip.sol: Warning: SPDX license identifier not provided in source file. Before publishing, consider adding a comment containing "SPDX-License-Identifier: <SPDX-License>" to each source file. Use "SPDX-License-Identifier: UNLICENSED" for non-open-source code. Please see https://spdx.org for more information.
errors.message: SPDX license identifier not provided in source file. Before publishing, consider adding a comment containing "SPDX-License-Identifier: <SPDX-License>" to each source file. Use "SPDX-License-Identifier: UNLICENSED" for non-open-source code. Please see https://spdx.org for more information.
Visibility for constructor is ignored. If you want the contract to be non-deployable, making it "abstract" is sufficient.
